caption: This image features a man interacting with a small, red and white seaplane that is equipped with pontoons and is floating on a body of water. The seaplaneâ€™s cabin is visible with its door open. The man, dressed in a white sweater and dark pants, is kneeling on one of the pontoons and using a long paddle to presumably maneuver or stabilize the seaplane. The background displays a lakeside view with dense trees exhibiting autumn colors, primarily red and orange, indicating the season. The overall scene is serene with a clear focus on the interaction between the man and the seaplane in an idyllic, natural setting.
title: Bush pilot Ted Anthonsen with his 4-seater seaplane moored near Old Forge
